name: Welcome to Albion!
description:
※All characters in this game are 18 or older.
Overview
This is an RPG.
There are puzzles in the game, but no combat.
Plot
Elf Nation and Mazoku Nation were on the brink of war.
In order to save both nations, the Son of God from Elf Nation (you)
headed into Albion, a city in enemy territory...
*Objective
Your goal
is to prevent the enemy invasion within 7 days.
There are 2 phases in a day. Day and night.
When you complete certain events,
time moves forward and you can move on to the next phase.
There are 14 phases in total.
